quote: Good books do not waste our time as most people do... collect a great quantity of books, build alibrary worthy of your noble soul, andspend without stint all the money necessary for it.
quote_letters: GOOD BOOKS DO NOT WASTE OUR TIME AS MOST PEOPLE DO COLLECT A GREAT QUANTITY OF BOOKS BUILD ALIBRARY WORTHY OF YOUR NOBLE SOUL ANDSPEND WITHOUT STINT ALL THE MONEY NECESSARY FOR IT
